fields.name: name
fields.title: Section Name
fields.description: Internal name for this hero section (not displayed on site)

fields.name: festivalName
fields.title: Festival Name
fields.description: Main festival title (e.g., "SHAKARA FESTIVAL")

fields.name: badge
fields.title: Badge Text
fields.description: Text shown in the badge above the title

fields.name: address
fields.title: Full Address
fields.description: Complete address for the venue

fields.name: stats
fields.title: Festival Stats
fields.description: Statistics displayed in the hero section

fields.name: artistCount
fields.title: Number of Artists
fields.description: Total number of performing artists

fields.name: expectedAttendance
fields.title: Expected Attendance
fields.description: Expected number of attendees (e.g., "50K+")

fields.name: dayCount
fields.title: Number of Days
fields.description: Duration of the festival in days

fields.name: heroVideo
fields.title: Hero Background Video
fields.description: Optional background video for the hero section (takes precedence over image)

fields.name: heroImage
fields.title: Hero Background Image
fields.description: Background image for the hero section (used when no video is provided)

fields.name: socialLinks
fields.title: Social Media Links
fields.description: Social media links displayed in the hero section

fields.name: description
fields.title: Festival Description
fields.description: Brief description of the festival (for SEO and meta tags)

fields.name: ctaButtons
fields.title: Call-to-Action Buttons
fields.description: Optional action buttons in the hero section

fields.name: showScrollIndicator
fields.title: Show Scroll Indicator
fields.description: Display the animated scroll indicator at the bottom

fields.name: showStats
fields.title: Show Statistics
fields.description: Display the festival statistics in the hero section

fields.name: showSocialLinks
fields.title: Show Social Links
fields.description: Display social media links in the hero section

fields.name: active
fields.title: Active Hero Section
fields.description: Set as the active hero section to display on the homepage

fields.name: featured
fields.title: Featured Artist
fields.description: Featured artists appear prominently on the lineup

fields.name: originalPrice
fields.title: Original Price (NGN)
fields.description: If this ticket is on sale, enter the original price here

fields.name: features
fields.title: Features
fields.description: List of features included with this ticket

fields.name: discount
fields.title: Discount Percentage
fields.description: Enter discount percentage (e.g., 25 for 25% off)

fields.name: saleStartDate
fields.title: Sale Start Date
fields.description: When this ticket becomes available for purchase

fields.name: saleEndDate
fields.title: Sale End Date
fields.description: When this ticket stops being available for purchase

fields.name: featured
fields.title: Featured Ticket
fields.description: Featured tickets appear prominently on the tickets page

fields.name: badge
fields.title: Badge Text
fields.description: Optional badge text (e.g., "BEST VALUE", "LIMITED TIME")

fields.name: order
fields.title: Display Order
fields.description: Order in which tickets should be displayed (lower numbers first)

fields.name: time
fields.title: Start Time
fields.description: Event start time (e.g., "6:00 PM")

fields.name: endTime
fields.title: End Time
fields.description: Event end time (optional)

fields.name: artist
fields.title: Featured Artist
fields.description: Link to artist if this is a musical performance

fields.name: featured
fields.title: Featured Event
fields.description: Featured events appear prominently in the schedule

fields.name: capacity
fields.title: Capacity
fields.description: Maximum number of attendees (optional)

fields.name: compareAtPrice
fields.title: Compare at Price (NGN)
fields.description: Original price if item is on sale

fields.name: preOrder
fields.title: Pre-Order Item
fields.description: Check if this is a pre-order item

fields.name: material
fields.title: Material
fields.description: e.g., 100% Cotton, Polyester Blend, etc.

fields.name: inventory
fields.title: Inventory Count
fields.description: Leave blank for unlimited inventory

fields.name: weight
fields.title: Weight (grams)
fields.description: Product weight for shipping calculations

fields.name: tags
fields.title: Tags
fields.description: Tags for search and filtering

fields.name: website
fields.title: Website URL
fields.description: Partner website link (optional)

fields.name: description
fields.title: Partner Description
fields.description: Brief description of the partnership

fields.name: featured
fields.title: Featured Partner
fields.description: Show in featured partners section

fields.name: active
fields.title: Active Partnership
fields.description: Is this partnership currently active?

fields.name: order
fields.title: Display Order
fields.description: Order for displaying partners (lower numbers first)

fields.name: logoVariant
fields.title: Logo Variant
fields.description: Which version of the logo to display

fields.name: benefits
fields.title: Partnership Benefits
fields.description: List of benefits provided by this partnership

fields.name: description
fields.title: Festival Description
fields.description: Main description of the festival

fields.name: icon
fields.title: Icon
fields.description: Icon name from react-icons (e.g., FaMusic, FaUtensils, FaPalette, FaUsers)

fields.name: active
fields.title: Active Section
fields.description: Is this the active about section?

fields.name: order
fields.title: Display Order
fields.description: Order for displaying sections (lower numbers first)

fields.name: introText
fields.title: Introduction Text
fields.description: Brief description of the lineup

fields.name: description
fields.title: Empty State Description
fields.initialValue: Get ready for an incredible lineup announcement featuring the best of African music!

fields.name: featuredArtistCount
fields.title: Number of Featured Artists to Show
fields.description: How many artists to display in the grid

fields.name: active
fields.title: Active Section
fields.description: Is this the active lineup section?

fields.name: order
fields.title: Display Order
fields.description: Order for displaying sections (lower numbers first)

fields.name: name
fields.title: Configuration Name
fields.description: Internal name for this footer configuration

fields.name: slug
fields.title: Slug
fields.description: Unique identifier for this footer configuration

fields.name: active
fields.title: Active
fields.description: Enable this footer configuration

fields.name: href
fields.title: Link URL
fields.description: Use # for anchor links (e.g., #about) or full URLs

fields.name: instagram
fields.title: Instagram
fields.description: Instagram profile URL

fields.name: twitter
fields.title: Twitter
fields.description: Twitter profile URL

fields.name: facebook
fields.title: Facebook
fields.description: Facebook page URL

fields.name: youtube
fields.title: YouTube
fields.description: YouTube channel URL

fields.name: spotify
fields.title: Spotify
fields.description: Spotify playlist or artist URL

fields.name: tiktok
fields.title: TikTok
fields.description: TikTok profile URL

fields.name: linkedin
fields.title: LinkedIn
fields.description: LinkedIn page URL

fields.name: copyright
fields.title: Copyright Text
fields.description: Copyright text (year will be automatically added)

fields.name: order
fields.title: Display Order
fields.description: Order in which this footer appears (lower numbers first)
